summary.span: 是 WPF 核心级实现的基类，这些实现是在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素和基本表示特性上生成的。

span.span: is a base class for WPF core level implementations building on Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements and basic presentation characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于元素布局特征，还可以重写派生类的虚方法，这可能会影响呈现行为的元素及其子元素的布局的公开提供的起始点。 provides a starting point for element layout characteristics, and also exposes virtual methods that derived classes can override, which can influence the layout rendering behavior of the element and its child elements. 大部分的输入和焦点的元素的行为通常中也定义类。Much of the input and focusing behavior for elements in general is also defined in the class. 这包括键盘、 鼠标和触笔输入和相关的状态属性的事件。This includes the events for keyboard, mouse and stylus input, and related status properties. 许多这些事件是路由的事件，并有许多与输入相关的事件的这两个浮升路由版本，以及事件的隧道版本。Many of these events are routed events, and many of the input-related events have both a bubbling routing version as well as a tunneling version of the event. 这些配对的事件通常是控件作者最感兴趣的事件。These paired events are typically the events of greatest interest to control authors. 此外包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]使与相关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件模型，包括可以引发指定的方法路由源自元素实例的事件。 also includes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that relate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] event model, including methods that can raise specified routed events that are sourced from an element instance. 在体系结构，方面可被视为大致相当于的窗口句柄[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]编程中或在元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dhtml](~/includes/tlasharptla-dhtml-md.md)]编程。In terms of architecture, can be considered roughly equivalent to a window handle in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] programming, or an Element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dhtml](~/includes/tlasharptla-dhtml-md.md)] programming. 是 WPF 核心级的基本元素。 is a base element at the WPF core level. 一个具有以下功能的具体定义类：A has the following capabilities that are specifically defined by the class: - 可以呈现为子元素 (派生自，高级图形类)Can render as a child element ( derives from , a high level graphics class) - 包含用于调整大小和位置的可能的子元素的逻辑（时由布局系统解释）Contains logic that is used to size and position possible child elements of a (when interpreted by a layout system) - 可以响应用户输入 （包括其中输入发送到通过其处理的事件路由或路由的命令的控件）Can respond to user input (including control of where input is getting sent to via their handling of event routing, or routing of commands) - 可以引发逻辑元素树路由的路由的事件Can raise routed events that travel a route through the logical element tree - 支持动画系统的某些方面Supports some aspects of the animation system 是基础构建的 WPF 框架级别实现类，并将添加与 WPF 框架级别的特定交互。 is the WPF framework-level implementation class that builds on , and adds specific interactions with the WPF framework level. 添加和定义了以下功能： adds and defines the following capabilities: - 其他特定于框架的布局特征Additional framework-specific layout characteristics - 更丰富的元数据报告属性的支持Support for richer metadata reporting on properties - 特定于类的实现的特定输入基类，这些类和其附加的属性或附加事件Class-specific implementation of certain input base classes and their attached properties or attached events - 样式支持Style support - 进一步的动画支持Further animation support 另一个相关的类是。Another related class is . 类实现相同的成员执行的许多; 这两个类之间的差异具有执行其预期与将放入的整体内容模型。The class implements many of the same members as does ; the difference between these two classes has to do with their intended place in the overall content model. 一个派生的类通常定义相对严格的内容模型中，这意味着有哪些元素可能是在标记中的子元素的限制。A derived class typically defines a relatively rigid content model, meaning that there are restrictions on what elements may be child elements in markup. 可能会花限制较少的子内容的容量，但该功能通常集中在指定的内容属性。There might be capacity for taking less restrictive child content in a , but that capacity is typically centralized in designated content properties. 一个派生的类通常不是限制有关内容，以支持方案，例如流格式的文档。A derived class is typically not as restrictive about content, to support scenarios such as flow-format documents. > [!IMPORTANT] > 状态会影响该元素的所有输入处理。 state affects all input handling by that element. 不可见的元素不参与命中测试和不接收输入的事件，即使鼠标位于边界的元素将是如果可见。Elements that are not visible do not participate in hit testing and do not receive input events, even if the mouse is over the bounds where the element would be if were visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新实例的类型实际上是并不常见，在应用程序代码中，因为是基本元素。Creating a new instance that is actually of type is uncommon in application code, because is a base element. 请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。See [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将相同事件的同一处理程序添加多个时间并且不会引发异常。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 但是，实际调用处理程序处理该事件时的多个时间。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，请考虑此行为可能应该在处理程序实现中考虑的副作用。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 通常使用此方法提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.

summary.span: 将 指定为 ，可为已标记为由事件路由中的其他元素处理的路由事件调用所提供的处理程序。

span.span: Specify as to have the provided handler be invoked for routed event that had already been marked as handled by another element along the event route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以实用方式处理低级别的输入的事件是一个复杂的任务。Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task. 许多控件实现其中某个事件被标记为已处理，并且另一个更直观的事件会被替换的行为。Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event. 通常情况下，控件将仅标记平台输入的事件，为已处理是否存在某个设计意图要求执行此操作。Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so. 在某些情况下，这些设计意图可能不是在特定输入事件的处理要求。In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires. 它对于这种情况是该注册处理程序替换`handledEventsToo`作为`true`适用。It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate. 但不是应定期执行此。But you should not do this routinely. 调用以响应所有事件处理程序，即使处理将增加你自己的应用程序事件处理逻辑的复杂性。Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic. 如果是巨大的处理程序逻辑，可能会降低性能。You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial. 你应保留附加的已处理事件的情况下，您已经发现在开发过程中的某些控件正在处理你仍想要使用的应用程序逻辑来处理的事件处理程序的使用。You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic. 避免处理的某些事件控件组合的行为的类的另一种方法是使用该事件的预览替代方法。Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative. 例如，如果标记为已处理类处理，您可以为添加处理程序相反。For example, if is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for instead. 可以将相同事件的同一处理程序添加多个时间并且不会引发异常。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 但是，实际调用处理程序处理该事件时的多个时间。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，请考虑此行为可能应该在处理程序实现中考虑的副作用。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 通常使用此方法提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event. ## Examples 下面的示例实现一个处理程序上调用将定义处理程序附加到一个页面使用的命名元素的页面上的事件`handledEventsToo` `true`。The following example implements a handler invoked on the event on a page that attaches a defined handler to one of the named elements on the page using `handledEventsToo` `true`. 将调用此处理程序，即使路由中的另一个元素标记为已处理到达路由中的处理元素之前的共享的事件数据。This handler would be invoked even if another element along the route marked the shared event data as handled before reaching the handling element in the route. [!code-csharp[EventOvwSupport#AddHandlerHandledToo](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml.cs#addhandlerhandledtoo)] [!code-vb[EventOvwSupport#AddHandlerHandledToo](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/visualbasic/page2.xaml.vb#addhandlerhandledtoo)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以由内容宿主元素 (实现或不匹配的) 若要添加到的子元素的处理程序。This method can be used by content host elements (either those that implement or those that don't) to add handlers for child elements to the . 通常，这不是必需的，这是因为处理程序会自动添加在已完成的逻辑树中找到的所有元素。Ordinarily, this is not required for , because handlers are automatically added for all elements found in a completed logical tree. 但是，在某些情况下，和混合在模板化树中，中间是来自要添加到路由模板需要的元素。However, in some cases where and are mixed in templated trees, intervening elements that came from the template need to be added to a route. 这两和支持此方法的版本。Both and support a version of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放操作默认情况下，不启用，必须通过设置有意启用到`true`。Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting to `true`. 除了此基本设置，拖放行为则完全是特定于实现的并且不由或任何其他基元素类。Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by or any other base element class. 例如，某些控件，是否有默认行为。Certain controls, for example, , do have a default behavior. 拖放功能的详细信息，请参阅[拖放概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md). 重写此依赖关系属性在其实现中的元数据。 overrides the metadata for this dependency property in its implementation. 具体而言，指定此属性以允许属性值继承 (是`true`元数据中)。Specifically, designates this property to allow property value inheritance ( is `true` in metadata). 在此上下文中的属性值继承意味着，如果有与任何其他值的子元素通过本地值或样式，分配 （也是在样式中，默认情况下此值与最接近的父元素的值分配值或本地值），则从父元素的值将由属性系统分配给所有以前未分配的子元素。Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a local value), then the value from the parent element will be assigned to all previously unassigned child elements by the property system. 实际上这意味着您可以指定是否允许删除操作在根元素和值将传播到所有子元素具有不是专门为其分配`false`。In practice this means that you can specify whether to allow drop operations at the root element, and that value will propagate to all child elements that have not specifically assigned it as `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 以下标记示例设置属性`true`上使用特性，以及一些其他设置相关属性的聚合中启用的为目标的多行文本数据对象时拖动它。The following markup example sets the property `true` using an attribute on a , as well as setting some other related properties that in aggregate enable that to be the target of a multiline text data object when it is dragged in. 有关完整示例，请参阅[加载删除文件示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be90d645-dd61-4f53-93bb-87902d086ef7)。For the complete sample, see [Load a Dropped File Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be90d645-dd61-4f53-93bb-87902d086ef7). [!code-xaml[DragDrop_DropOpenTextFile#UIElementAllowDrop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DropOpenTextFile/CS/window1.xaml#uielementallowdrop)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要从属性中删除动画，指定为该属性的标识符`dp`并指定`clock`作为`null`。To remove an animation from a property, specify the identifier for that property as `dp` and specify `clock` as `null`. 这会删除动画，动画的属性设置为其基值。This removes the animation and the animated property is set to its base value. 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时钟。However, the originally associated animation clock is not stopped. 其他任何分配给该时钟的动画将继续运行。Any other animations assigned to that clock will continue to run. ## Examples 在以下示例中， `myAnimatedRectangle`有特定的时间的动画应用于它通过调用。In the following example, a `myAnimatedRectangle` has a particular timing animation applied to it by calling . remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 WPF 框架级元素派生方案，行为更改不应 （和不能除非使用阴影）。For WPF framework-level element deriving scenarios, behavior for should not (and cannot, unless you shadow) be changed. 相反，应重写在类中的实现。Instead, you should override the implementation in your class. 你在内部调用实现作为默认 WPF 框架级别的布局操作的一部分。Your implementation is called internally by as part of default WPF framework-level layout operations. 你实现还应调用每个子元素，如果具有子元素上。Your implementation should also call on each child element, if it has child elements. 对于 WPF 核心级元素派生方案的行为更改不应 （和不能除非使用阴影）。For WPF core-level element deriving scenarios, the behavior for should not (and cannot, unless you shadow) be changed. 相反，应重写在类中。Instead, you should override in your class. 你在内部调用实现作为默认 WPF 框架级别的布局操作的一部分。Your implementation is called internally by as part of default WPF framework-level layout operations. 但是，这假定你使用的 WPF 框架级别的布局和通常不是这样，如果将特别派生元素出现在 WPF 核心级别从其布局系统基元素类。However, this assumes you are using WPF framework-level layout and its layout system, which is often not the case if you are specifically deriving elements at the WPF core-level from the base element class. 你实现还应调用每个子元素，如果具有子元素上。Your implementation should also call on each child element, if it has child elements. 请注意，WPF 核心级别方案意味着您不使用派生的类，因为印章并。Note that the WPF core-level scenario implies that you are not using a derived class, because seals . WPF 框架级别中的布局位置计算[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]组成调用和调用。Computation of WPF framework-level layout positioning in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] consists of a call and an call. 期间调用时，布局系统确定使用提供的元素的大小要求(`availableSize`) 参数。During the call, the layout system determines an element's size requirements using a provided (`availableSize`) argument. 期间调用时，布局系统确定大小和位置的元素的边界框。During the call, the layout system finalizes the size and position of an element's bounding box. 请参阅[布局](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md). `availableSize` 可以是从零到无穷大的任意数字。`availableSize` can be any number from zero to infinity. 元素的分布方式返回最小值它们需要通过`availableSize`参数。Elements to be laid out return the minimum they require through the `availableSize` parameter. 当首次实例化一个布局时，它始终会接收之前调用。When a layout is first instantiated, it always receives a call before . 但是之后第一个布局处理过程，, 它可能会收到而无需调用; 这可以仅影响的属性时更改 （如对齐方式），或者接收到父而无需.However, after the first layout pass, it may receive an call without a ; this can happen when a property that affects only is changed (such as alignment), or when the parent receives an without a . 一个调用将自动使失效调用。A call will automatically invalidate an call. 以异步方式 （在由布局系统时间） 通常会发生布局更新。Layout updates generally occur asynchronously (at a time determined by the layout system). 元素可能不会立即反映对影响元素大小的属性的更改 (如)。An element might not immediately reflect changes to properties that affect element sizing (such as ). > [!NOTE] > 可以通过强制布局更新方法; 但是，调用此函数不建议，因为它通常不需要可能会导致性能不佳。Layout updates can be forced by using the method; however, calling this function is not recommended, as it is usually unnecessary and can cause poor performance. 在许多情况下，调用可能合适，布局系统可能已经在处理更新。In many situations where calling might be appropriate, the layout system will probably already be processing updates. 布局系统可以处理作为包的一部分，可以优化所有必要的更新的方式的布局更改。The layout system can process layout changes in a manner that can optimize all necessary updates as part of a package. 布局系统保留的无效布局，一个用于两个单独的队列，另一个用于。The layout system keeps two separate queues of invalid layouts, one for and one for . 布局队列是根据可视树中的元素的顺序排序的。The layout queue is sorted based upon the order of elements in the visual tree. 在树中较高级别的元素是队列的顶部，是队列的为了避免冗余布局父级中的重复更改所造成的。Elements higher in the tree are at the top of the queue, in order to avoid redundant layouts caused by repeated changes in parents. 自动从队列中删除重复项，如果它们是有效的元素会自动删除从队列。Duplicate entries are automatically removed from the queue, and elements are automatically removed from the queue if they are already valid. 更新布局时，队列为空首先后, 跟队列。When updating layout, the queue is emptied first, followed by the queue. 中的元素队列中的元素是否将永远不会进行排列队列。An element in the queue will never be arranged if there is an element in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 重写此方法才会适当派生在 WPF 核心级别，并且你未使用 WPF 框架级别的布局系统和派生的类，因为印章并。Overriding this method is only appropriate if you are deriving at the WPF core-level, and you are not using the WPF framework-level layout system and derived class, because seals . 如果使用的 WPF 框架级别的布局系统，合适的方法来重写类特定于布局的排列行为是。If you are using the WPF framework-level layout system, the appropriate method to override for class-specific layout arrange behavior is . ## Examples 实现应调用基实现返回一个大小，然后调用方法的每个可见子元素，并且对这些返回的大小进行协调调用基实现的大小。 implementations should call the base implementation to return a size, then call the method of each visible child element, and reconcile the sizes returned by these calls with the size of the base implementation. 对帐方面的逻辑实现可能会有所不同，具体取决于您的元素的布局特征。The logic for the reconciliation aspect of a implementation might vary, depending on the layout characteristics of your element. 在下面的示例模板中，`VisualChildren`是一个假想的属性，您的元素可能会定义以便枚举其内容;未定义内容集合在此级别，WPF 框架级别体系结构将延迟等特定控件或控件基类的派生元素内容的行为。In the following example template, `VisualChildren` is a hypothetical property that your element might define to help enumerate its content; does not define content collections at this level, the WPF framework-level architecture defers content behavior to derived elements such as specific controls or control base classes. [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementArrangeOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementarrangeoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementArrangeOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementarrangeoverride)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选中属性进行动画处理，请注意，动画将开始考虑经过动画处理的非动画的起始点以外的第一帧呈现时。When you check whether a property is animated, note that the animation will begin and be considered animated when the first frame beyond the non-animated starting point is rendered. 如果有关`animation`是`null`，然后删除任何当前动画并保持的属性的当前值。If the for `animation` is `null`, then any current animations are removed and the current value of the property is held. 如果整个`animation`值是`null`、 从属性中移除所有动画和属性值会恢复为其基值。If the entire `animation` value is `null`, all animations are removed from the property and the property value reverts to its base value. 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时间线。However, the originally associated animation timeline is not stopped. 分配给该时间线中的其他任何动画将继续运行。Any other animations assigned to that timeline will continue to run. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的动画，并为分配它，然后调用来启动它。The following example creates an animation, assigns it, and then calls to start it. summary.span: 尝试将鼠标强制捕获到此元素。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要捕获，必须启用一个元素。To be captured, an element must be enabled. 检查是否是`true`在调用之前。Check whether is `true` before you call . 如果调用将返回`true`，然后也是`true`。If calling returns `true`, then is also `true`. 如果调用返回`true`，然后并引发事件，与在事件数据报告为元素其中调用方法。If calling returns `true`, then the and events are raised, with in the event data reported as the element where the method is called. 如果强制捕获，您可能会妨碍现有捕获-尤其是在使用与拖放鼠标捕获。If you force capture, you might interfere with existing captures - especially with captures that relate to drag-and-drop with the mouse. 若要清除的所有元素的鼠标捕获，请调用与`element`参数作为提供`null`。To clear mouse capture from all elements, call with the `element` parameter provided as `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例实现对鼠标和输入的组合键，将鼠标捕获 （和取消捕获） 的处理程序，并启用一种特殊的鼠标模式用于查看三维模型。The following example implements a pair of handlers for mouse and key input combination that capture (and uncapture) the mouse and enable a special mouse mode for viewing a 3D model. summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义元素内容轮廓的几何图形。

span.span: Gets or sets the geometry used to define the outline of the contents of an element.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 用于剪裁区域大小的几何图形。

span.span: The geometry to be used for clipping area sizing.

value.span: 默认值为 null 。

span.span: The default is a null .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将在呈现的布局中直观地剪辑几何图形外部的元素。Elements outside the geometry will be visually clipped in the rendered layout. 几何图形没有为矩形。The geometry does not have to be rectangular. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何定义框架元素的区域。This example shows how to define a framework element's region. 若要定义一个剪辑，请使用(例如，元素的设置属性。To define a clip, use a (for example, an to set the element's property. 只是几何图形的区域内的区域将显示。Only the area that is within the region of the geometry will be visible. 下面的示例演示而无需定义的剪辑区域的元素。The following example shows an element without a defined clip region. 由于定义没有剪辑区域，则将显示整个图像。Because no clip region is defined, the entire image is displayed. [!code-xaml[ClipPathExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClipPathExample/CS/ClipExample.xaml#2)] ![应用剪辑区域之前的对象](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-noclip.png "之前应用剪辑区域的对象")![An object before applying a clip region](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-noclip.png "An object before applying a clip region") 没有剪辑区域的图像Image with No Clip Region 在下一步的示例中，创建完全相同的映像，只不过它具有定义的剪辑区域。In the next example, an identical Image is created, except that it has a defined clip region. 只有在区域内的图像的部分将显示。Only the part of the image that is within the area the will be displayed. [!code-xaml[ClipPathExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClipPathExample/CS/ClipExample.xaml#4)] ![经过剪辑的对象](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-ellispe.PNG "经过剪辑的对象")![A clipped object](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-ellispe.PNG "A clipped object") 具有椭圆的剪辑区域的图像Image with an Elliptical Clip Region 下面的示例演示如何处理动画框架元素的区域。The following example shows how animate a framework element's region. 在此示例中，用于定义的椭圆的剪辑区域元素。In this example, an is used to define an elliptical clip region for an element. 一个之间进行动画处理的椭圆几何图形属性从 （0，0） 到 （200，150）。A animates the ellipse geometry's property from (0, 0) to (200, 150). 在动画开始播放后加载图像并无限期地重复。The animation starts playing after the image is loaded and repeats indefinitely. [!code-xaml[ClipPathExample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClipPathExample/CS/ClipExample.xaml#5)] 有关完整示例，请参阅[剪辑区域示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83043a0b-f824-445f-9675-103280c5ca67)。For the full sample, see the [Clip Region Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83043a0b-f824-445f-9675-103280c5ca67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子元素具有不同的效果，具体取决于是否高度和宽度的父元素正在由布局行为 / 或 / .For child elements, has different effects on layout behaviors depending on whether the height and width of the parent element are being determined by / or / . / 而不考虑的值始终遵守的父元素和有效剪辑始终将剪辑内容根据这些最大值。 / of the parent element are always respected regardless of the value of and the effective clipping will always clip the content based on these maximums. 父 / 设置不会剪裁内容时是`false`，但将剪辑内容如果是`true`。The parent's / settings will not clip the content when is `false`, but will clip the content if is `true`. 请注意，默认为`false`是在中实现的常规行为类。Note that defaulting to `false` is the general behavior as implemented in the class. 很可能派生自任何给定元素重写此属性默认为该实例中的依赖项属性元数据`true`相反。It is possible for any given element that derives from to override the dependency property metadata for this property in that instance to default to `true` instead. 多个现有的派生的类重写此元数据和/或调整依赖项属性默认值。Several existing derived classes override this metadata and/or adjust the dependency property default value. ，并每个重写此默认值为`true`。, , and each override the default value to be `true`. 重写此依赖项属性的元数据。 overrides the metadata for this dependency property. 具体而言，指定此属性以允许属性值继承 (是`true`元数据中)。Specifically, designates this property to allow property value inheritance ( is `true` in metadata). 在此上下文中的属性值继承意味着，如果有与任何其他值的子元素通过本地值或样式，分配 （也是在样式中，默认情况下此值与最接近的父元素的值分配值，或本地值)，则从父元素的值将由属性系统分配给所有未分配的子元素。Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a locally value), then the value from the parent element will be assigned to all unassigned child elements by the property system. 实际上这意味着您可以指定是否允许剪切到边界在根元素和值将传播到所有子元素具有不是专门为其分配`false`。In practice this means that you can specify whether to allow clip to bounds at the root element, and that value will propagate to all child elements that have not specifically assigned it as `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 另一种典型的方法来填充集合是使用方法以编程方式。Another typical way to populate the collection is to use methods programmatically. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCommandBindings**oneOrMoreCommandBindings* 一个或多个元素。One or more elements. 其中每项功能都应有属性设置为已知命令和属性设置为和的处理程序实现。Each of these should have a attribute set to a known command, and attributes set for the and handler implementations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information see . ## Examples 下面的示例添加到使用标记的窗口。The following example adds a to a window using markup. 请注意，在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，则不为元素; 标记中声明的集合对象将该属性会采用，类型推断并填充一个或多个具有的属性元素元素：Note that in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the is not declared in the markup as an element; the collection object is inferred by the type that the property takes, and you populate the property element with one or more elements: [!code-xaml[commandWithHandler#CommandHandlerCommandBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandhandlercommandbinding)] 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法的集合，请参见[XAML 语法详述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For more information about the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for collections, see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 下面的示例执行在代码中实质上是相同的操作：The following example does essentially the same thing in code: [!code-csharp[CommandHandlerProcedural#CommandHandlerBindingInit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandHandlerProcedural/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandhandlerbindinginit)] [!code-vb[CommandHandlerProcedural#CommandHandlerBindingInit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandHandlerProcedural/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandhandlerbindinginit)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值才有效的度量单位，如果的值属性是`true`。The value returned by this property will only be a valid measurement if the value of the property is `true`. 通常检查为其中一个的测量因素时实现的布局行为如重写， ，或(在用例中，你可能会检查相反，但这取决于你实现）。 is typically checked as one of the measurement factors when you implement layout behavior overrides such as , , or (in the case, you might check instead, but this depends on your implementation). 根据方案，可能会完全遵循你的实现逻辑，约束上可能应用此类约束也可能更改的父元素或子元素的其他特征。Depending on the scenario, might be fully respected by your implementation logic, constraints on might be applied, and such constraints might also change other characteristics of either the parent element or child element. 例如，支持可滚动区域 （但选择不从已启用可滚动区域的 WPF 框架级别控件派生） 的控件无法比较可用大小与。For example, a control that supports scrollable regions (but chooses not to derive from the WPF framework-level controls that already enable scrollable regions) could compare available size to . 然后，该控件可以设置启用滚动条中的内部状态[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]为该控件。The control could then set an internal state that enabled scrollbars in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for that control. 或者，可能还在某些情况下忽略。Or, could potentially also be ignored in certain scenarios. ## Examples 下面的示例演示作为的一部分实现。The following example shows as part of a implementation. 请注意如何获取前立即调用。Notice how is called immediately prior to obtaining . 这可以确保保存合法值。This assures that holds a legitimate value. summary.span: 尝试将焦点设定到此元素上。

span.span: Attempts to set focus to this element.

returns.span: 如果键盘焦点和逻辑焦点同时设定到此元素上，则为 ；如果只有逻辑焦点设定到此元素上或此方法调用未强制更改焦点，则为 。

span.span: if keyboard focus and logical focus were set to this element; if only logical focus was set to this element, or if the call to this method did not force the focus to change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可获得焦点，并都必须`true`。To be focusable, and must both be `true`. 即使该元素是可获得焦点和有效的`Focus`预览事件可能在特定树中，处理并专注于该元素可能不允许 （例如，在复合控件）。Even if the element is focusable and valid, the `Focus` preview events may be processed in a specific tree, and focus on that element may not be allowed (for example, in a composite control). 在这种情况下，此方法返回`false`。In such a case, this method returns `false`. 一般情况下，焦点受两个不同的概念： 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点。In general, focus is controlled by two different concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus. 这两个概念并不总是相同。These two concepts are not always the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅[焦点摘要](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)并[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Focus summary](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如果调用将返回`true`，并还有`true`。If calling returns `true`, and are also `true`. 如果相关的属性不是已经`true`，则在调用，按以下顺序引发一个或多个以下事件： ， （来源为新的焦点目标）， ， ，， （来源为新的焦点目标）。If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call , one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: , (source is the new focus target), , , , (source is the new focus target). 为了使此调用成功，应用程序中的某些其他元素需要以前具有焦点。In order for this call to be successful, some other element in the application needed to have focus previously. ## Examples 下面的示例将焦点设置到所引用的，然后调整中光标的位置和。The following example sets focus to a referenced by , and then adjusts the position of the cursor within the . [!code-csharp[TextBox_CursorToEnd#UIElementFocus](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBox_CursorToEnd/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#uielementfocus)] [!code-vb[TextBox_CursorToEnd#UIElementFocus](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBox_CursorToEnd/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#uielementfocus)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有焦点的元素接收键盘输入。Only the focused element receives keyboard input. 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]属性访问器，它实际上是依赖项属性。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property. 此特定的依赖项属性经常具有派生的元素类，尤其是在控件中以不同方式设置其原本"默认"值。This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes, particularly in controls. 这通常发生在两种方式之一：This commonly occurs in one of two ways: - 由特定的派生类，继承依赖属性，但该派生类重写依赖属性的元数据，并更改属性的默认值。The dependency property is inherited by a particular derived class, but that derived class overrides the metadata of the dependency property and changes the property default value. - 样式或模板应用于元素，从而以不同方式设置的依赖项属性值。A style or template is applied to an element, which sets that dependency property value differently. 例如，明显"default"的有关控件将是`true`，即使继承作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]属性直接从。For example, the apparent "default" of for a control will be `true`, even though inherits as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property directly from . 这是因为应用元数据值依赖项属性中的静态构造函数重写基类，该基类位于之间和类层次结构中。This is because the applied metadata value for the dependency property was overridden within the static constructor of the base class, which is situated between and in the class hierarchy. 当由继承或其派生的类，重新定义为此属性的默认值`true`。When inherited by or its derived classes, redefines the default value of this property to be `true`. 通过继承时(即派生的类)，默认值已再次重新定义为`false`。When inherited by (which is a derived class), the default value is again redefined to be `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了特定的自定义控件，设置控件模板`false`在模板中的元素之一。The following example code illustrates a control template for a particular custom control, which sets `false` on one of the elements within the template. [!code-xaml[RichTextBox_NoScrollViewer#_ControlTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBox_NoScrollViewer/CS/window1.xaml#_controltemplate)]

summary.span: 为此元素上的指定属性返回基属性值，忽略任何可能来自正在运行或已停止的动画的动画值。

span.span: Returns the base property value for the specified property on this element, disregarding any possible animated value from a running or stopped animation.

returns.span: 就像没有动画被附加到指定的依赖属性一样的属性值。

span.span: The property value as if no animations are attached to the specified dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有动画附加到属性，则返回值也始终等于返回值。If no animations are attached to the property, then the return value is always identical to the return value. 如果有附加的动画，然后所有可能的动画派生值包括开始和停止值将被忽略，并根据所有其他可能的输入确定的属性值。If there are animations attached, then all possible animation derived values including the start and stop values are ignored, and the property value is determined based on all other possible inputs. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). ## Examples 下面的示例实现的处理程序报告一个经过动画处理的基值属性上的，以及一个转换，转换的基础价值。The following example implements a handler that reports the base value of an animated property on a , as well as the base value of a transform. [!code-csharp[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#GetAnimationBaseValue](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/CSharp/GetAnimationBaseValueExample.cs#getanimationbasevalue)] [!code-vb[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#GetAnimationBaseValue](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/visualbasic/getanimationbasevalueexample.vb#getanimationbasevalue)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认虚拟实现返回`null`。The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`. 提供了实际的实现。 provides a practical implementation. 替代父级的用于事件路由，在其中元素创建的替代父结构以便将其事件路由有何区别路由到标准的父级，在可视树的标准模式的方式的情况下或在向下预览路由策略。Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果焦点有意强制使用方法调用，但前一个键盘焦点位于不同的作用域将与键盘焦点不同逻辑焦点。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此方案中，键盘焦点将保持其所在位置和元素其中方法称为仍获得逻辑焦点。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 此事件的更精确地解释是它时引发的值路由中元素的属性有所不同`false`到`true`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`. 此事件使用冒泡路由，因为接收焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据以确定实际获得焦点的元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有相应的隧道事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在此元素捕获鼠标时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使在鼠标指针位于其边界外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds. 鼠标通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获和保持捕获，直到发生拖放操作。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 此事件使用冒泡路由，因为具有捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查在事件数据，以确定实际元素具有鼠标捕获。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture. 此事件创建一个别名附加的此类事件，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

span.span: Occurs when this element captures the stylus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获触笔，它会接收触笔输入，即使在指针位于其边界外。When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 在触笔通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获和捕获之前发生拖放操作的状态将保持。The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 此事件使用冒泡路由，因为具有捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据来确定具有捕获的实际元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has capture. 此事件创建此类的附加事件的别名，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的绑定支持命令来输入设备的绑定。Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices. 例如，实现的输入包括特定于鼠标设备的属性的绑定。For example, implements input bindings that include properties that are particular to mouse devices. 适用于类型的输入的绑定以及声明的实例的输入的绑定，将包括输入绑定的集合。The collection of input bindings will include both input bindings that pertain to the type as well as input bindings that are declared on the instance. 相关的属性， ，维护命令绑定的集合。A related property, , maintains a collection of command bindings. 这些不同于输入绑定，因为它们表示下一级别的命令处理过程绑定到已知命令的操作。These differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreInputBindings**oneOrMoreInputBindings* 一个或多个元素 (通常或派生类)。One or more elements (typically the or derived classes). 其中每项功能都必须具有和属性设置。Each of these is expected to have a and attribute set. ## Examples 下面的示例上填充此属性，使用单个。The following example populates this property on a , with a single . [!code-xaml[CommandingOverviewSnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法的集合，请参见[XAML 语法详述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For more information about the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for collections, see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回作为返回类型，因为该类型是两个公共接口和。 is returned as the return type, because that type is a common interface for both and . 然后，可以适当地强制转换返回类型，或使用定义的某些成员的接口实例接口。You can then cast the return type appropriately, or use the interface instance for certain members that are defined by the interface. 从应用程序代码通常不调用此方法。This method typically is not called from your application code. 调用此方法时才适合想要重新实现大量已存在，例如重新创建设备的鼠标逻辑的较低级别输入功能。Calling this method is only appropriate if you intend to re-implement a substantial amount of the low level input features that are already present, such as recreating mouse device logic. 协定具有相同的签名，某些元素选择显式实现该方法。 contracts an method with the same signature, which some elements choose to implement explicitly.

summary.span: 使元素排列状态（布局）无效。

span.span: After the invalidation, the element will have its layout updated, which will occur asynchronously unless subsequently forced by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 频繁调用或在特定于有显著的性能影响。Frequent calls to or in particular to have significant performance consequences. 因此，避免调用此方法，除非绝对需要精确布局状态以便进行后续调用对其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]在代码中。Therefore, avoid calling this method unless you absolutely require precise layout state for subsequent calls to other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in your code. 一种高级的方案，其中可能会调用是如果你要创建不在的依赖关系属性或派生发生更改时仍会影响布局的排列处理过程的类。An advanced scenario where you might call is if you are creating a for a dependency property that is not on a or derived class that still influences the arrange pass of layout when it changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateMeasure() cil managed

summary.span: 使元素度量状态（布局）无效。

span.span: Invalidates the measurement state (layout) for the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法还在调用在内部，则无需调用和连续。Calling this method also calls internally, there is no need to call and in succession. 后失效，元素将具有其布局更新，这将以异步方式发生，除非调用以强制进行同步的布局更改。After the invalidation, the element will have its layout updated, which will occur asynchronously, unless is called to force a synchronous layout change. WPF 框架级别的布局系统会自行处理的一个元素的可视化树中的更改并在最常见布局失效的情况下布局系统时调用此方法在必要时等效。The WPF framework-level layout system does its own handling of changes in the visual tree of an element, and in most common layout invalidation cases the layout system is calling the equivalent of this method when necessary. 如果你生成一个完整布局实现，直接操作的元素树中，或类似的高级方案，应只调用此方法。You should only call this method if you are producing a complete layout implementation, which does direct manipulation of the element tree, or similar advanced scenarios. 其中一种高级的方案是如果你要创建不在的依赖关系属性或派生发生更改时仍会影响布局的测量处理的类。One such advanced scenario is if you are creating a for a dependency property that is not on a or derived class that still influences the measure pass of layout when it changes. 频繁调用或在特定于有显著的性能影响。Frequent calls to or in particular to have significant performance consequences. 因此，避免调用此方法，除非绝对需要精确布局状态以便进行后续调用对其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]在代码中。Therefore, avoid calling this method unless you absolutely require precise layout state for subsequent calls to other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in your code.

WPF 框架级别的布局系统会自行处理一个元素的可视化树中的更改并会调用此方法在必要时的等效项已。The WPF framework-level layout system does its own handling of changes in the visual tree of an element, and would be calling the equivalent of this method when necessary already. 调用此方法是只需将高级的方案。Calling this method is necessary only for advanced scenarios. 其中一种高级的方案是如果你要创建不在的依赖关系属性或派生发生更改时仍会影响布局的类。One such advanced scenario is if you are creating a for a dependency property that is not on a or derived class that still influences the layout when it changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以强制排列方式，可以通过调用失效此元素 （或其父项）。You can force arrangement to be invalidated by calling on this element (or its parents). 在布局系统确定如次时，此标志重新组合的布局。This flags the layout for recomposition at such time as the layout system determines. 或者，直接调用到无法进行，但应仅进行此操作确定，没有其他挂起的 （大量不必要的强制更新具有性能产生负面影响）。Alternatively, an immediate call to could be made, but this should only be done if it is certain that no further invalidations are pending (a large number of unnecessarily forced updates has performance consequences). 不能`true`除非也是`true`（在布局过程中，排列方式不能为有效而无需第一次进行有效的度量）。 cannot be `true` unless is also `true` (in the layout process, arrangement cannot be valid without measurement first being valid).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此属性是特定于类的实现在特定元素，通常在运行时上。Note that this property is influenced by class-specific implementations of on particular elements, often at runtime. 因此，此处列出的默认值有时不是有效。Therefore, the default value listed here is sometimes not effective. 例如，将是`false`时确定是否有无需支持滚动条。For instance, a will be `false` whenever it is determined that there is no need to support a scrollbar. 尝试设置此值将还可能会重写返回的值。Attempting to set this value will also potentially be overridden by the value returned by . 未启用的元素不参与命中测试或焦点，因此不将输入事件的源。Elements that are not enabled do not participate in hit testing or focus and therefore will not be sources of input events. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个处理程序上一个按钮时执行的将设置`false`另一个命名按钮上`b1`。The following example shows a handler on one button that when executed will set `false` on another named button `b1`. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值确定此元素是否具有逻辑焦点。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether this element has logical focus.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 如果此元素具有逻辑焦点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this element has logical focus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序具有多个焦点部门，如菜单的内容和应用程序的其余部分之间，可能与键盘焦点不同逻辑焦点。Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application. 在此方案中，键盘焦点仅可对应用程序 UI 中的一个元素，但是，其他焦点分支中的某些元素仍可能会保留逻辑焦点。In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus. 有关逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on logical focus, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 通过设置此属性 （它是只读的） 未设置焦点。You do not set focus by setting this property (it is read-only). 此属性的典型用法是使用为的依赖关系属性或。The typical use for this property is to use it as a dependency property for a or . 若要以编程方式设置焦点，请调用。To set focus programmatically, call . 由用户操作或控件实现，其中可能包括鼠标捕获行为，还可以设置焦点。Focus can also be set by user action or by control implementations, which possibly include mouse capture behavior. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例是当它专注度时，更改控件的背景的代码处理程序。The following example is a code handler that changes the background of a control when it is focused. [!code-csharp[PopupSimple#IsFocused](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#isfocused)] 另一种常见的方法来实现此相同的效果是放置在的控件，则这种方法不需要处理与隐藏代码的特定事件，允许设计器的交互式和图形性质的更多权限访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Another common way to achieve this same effect is to place a in the of a control; this approach does not require handling specific events with code-behind and allows designers greater access to the interactive and graphical nature of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 有关示例，请参见 [如何：创建的外发光效果](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a2ccf19a-d0dc-4e3c-88e3-95d7f7d765b1)。For an example, see [How to: Create an Outer Glow Effect](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a2ccf19a-d0dc-4e3c-88e3-95d7f7d765b1).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值声明是否可以返回此元素作为其呈现内容的某些部分的点击测试结果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that declares whether this element can possibly be returned as a hit test result from some portion of its rendered content.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 如果此元素可以从至少一个点作为命中测试结果返回，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this element could be returned as a hit test result from at least one point; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 逻辑树中的命中测试的元素的相对位置会影响此属性的有效值。The effective value of this property is influenced by the relative positions of hit testable elements in the logical tree. 例如，如果一个元素的子元素的元素进行命中测试可见，子属性的有效值将始终`false`，即使尝试在本地设置该值。For instance, if an element is a child element of an element that is not hit test visible, the effective value of the property on the child will remain `false`, even if attempting to set that value locally. 出于此原因，务必不要设置到`false`复合控件除非您不需要任何输入或对该控件进行命中测试。For this reason, it is important that you do not set to `false` on a composited control unless you do not want any input or hit testing on that control. 有关命中测试的详细信息，请参阅[可视化层中的命中测试](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md)。For more information on hit testing, see [Hit Testing in the Visual Layer](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示布局测量返回的当前大小是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the current size returned by layout measure is valid.

value.span: 如果布局的测量处理过程返回一个有效的当前值，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the measure pass of layout returned a valid and current value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以强制测量和排列方式，可以通过调用失效此元素 （或可视化树上的任何父元素）。You can force measurement and arrangement to be invalidated by calling on this element (or any parent element up the visual tree). 这会指示布局以进行重新组合以异步方式发生在由布局系统的时间。This designates the layout for recomposition asynchronously, occurring at a time determined by the layout system. 或者，可以直接调用。Alternatively, you could make an immediate call to . 但是，您应只调用如果则很可能，没有其他挂起的 （大量不必要的强制更新会对性能产生影响）。However, you should only call if it is likely that no further invalidations are pending (a large number of unnecessarily forced updates will have performance consequences). 如果是`false`，也必须`false`（通过布局过程的执行逻辑，排列方式不能为有效而无需第一次进行有效的度量）。If is `false`, must also be `false` (by the enforced logic of the layout process, arrangement cannot be valid without measurement first being valid).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同，此属性才是`true`与命中测试如果将鼠标指针位于 literal 元素-。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the mouse pointer is over the literal element - as it is for a hit test. 而如果鼠标指针位于子元素上，特别是对所包含的元素的更深层的模板和组合的情况下，元素，此属性将为`false`。If the mouse pointer is instead over a child element, in particular over elements that are part of an element's deeper template and compositing, this property will be `false`. 除非你知道如何控件的组合 （例如，使用此属性在自定义控件模板中定义的控件），此属性可能返回意外的结果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 对于大多数情况下不创作控件的情况，请使用相反。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果此元素捕获鼠标，并且此属性是`true`在捕获时，此属性将继续返回`true`直到失去鼠标捕获，并且指针不是其边界上。If the mouse is captured by this element, and this property is `true` at time of capture, this property will continue to return `true` until mouse capture is lost and the pointer is not over its bounds. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，控件都是复合，以便控件 （可视树） 中的各种元素都将报告包含控件的鼠标状态。Typically, controls are composited such that the various elements inside the control (the visual tree) will all report the mouse state for the containing control. 例如，样式的控件将报告作为`true`如果鼠标的任何位置通过几何形状，包括任何。For example, a style control will report as `true` if the mouse is anywhere over its geometry, including any . 尽管类似"等效于"事件不存在，将通过几个类似的事件。Although an analogous "IsMouseOverChanged" event does not exist, several similar events do. 例如，可以处理， ，和。For example, you can handle , , and . 如果此元素捕获鼠标时，此属性将保持`true`直到失去鼠标捕获并且鼠标指针离开元素边界。If this element captures the mouse, this property remains `true` until mouse capture is lost and the mouse pointer leaves the element bounds. 某些控件有意捕获鼠标上不会显示直接涉及鼠标某些操作。Some controls deliberately capture the mouse on certain actions that do not appear to directly involve the mouse. 这可能会导致正在`true`即使看似未移动鼠标。This can lead to being `true` even though the mouse has not apparently moved. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例引用此属性的属性类型为，它属于\ 块。The following example references this property as the property type of a , part of a \ block. 如果鼠标位于控件上，控件文本会变成蓝色，并且光标变成手的形状。If the mouse is over the control, the control text turns blue and the cursor becomes a hand. [!code-xaml[ListViewChkBox#Trigger](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewChkBox/CS/window1.xaml#trigger)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同，此属性才是`true`如果触笔位于元素上。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the stylus is over the element. 如果触笔改为通过子元素或元素的元素的更深入地组合 （可视树） 的一部分，此属性将为`false`。If the stylus is instead over a child element or over elements that are part of an element's deeper compositing (the visual tree), this property will be `false`. 除非你知道如何控件的组合 （例如，使用此属性在自定义控件模板中定义的控件），此属性可能返回意外的结果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 对于大多数情况下不创作控件的情况，请使用相反。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果此元素具有触笔捕获，并且此属性是`true`捕获时，此属性将保持`true`直到触笔捕获，丢失和触笔不能通过其边界。If this element has stylus capture and this property is `true` at the time of capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the stylus is not over its bounds. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入中的特定关系存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定值将布局的所有因素考虑在内。Determination of the value takes all factors of layout into account. 与此相反， ，这是一个可设置属性，仅指示想要以编程方式使元素可见或不可见。In contrast, , which is a settable property, only indicates the intention to programmatically make an element visible or invisible. 元素的是`false`不参与输入的事件 （或命令），请执行不会影响度量值或排列过程的布局、 不是可获得焦点、 不是按选项卡顺序和命中测试中将不会报告。Elements where is `false` do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the measure or arrange passes of layout, are not focusable, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 与之相反，元素的是`false`仍将参与事件和命令，以及命中测试，但不还可获得焦点。In contrast, elements where is `false` will still participate in events and commands, and hit testing, but are also not focusable. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥处理与其他平台功能，例如命令和文本组合进行交互。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 事件是一个较低级别的文本输入的事件，可能不会像预期某些控件上。The event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls. 这是文本的因为某些控件具有控件组合或提供更高级版本的类处理输入处理和相关的事件。This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events. 此事件创建一个别名附加的此类事件，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在此元素丢失逻辑焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有意通过某个方法调用强制失去了焦点，而前一个键盘焦点位于不同的范围内，则逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此方案，其中是键盘焦点将保留和元素其中方法称为仍获得逻辑焦点。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is, and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 此事件的更精确地解释是它时引发的值路由中的元素的属性从更改`true`到`false`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route changes from `true` to `false`. 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，因此失去焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据以确定实际获得焦点的元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有相应的隧道事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使在指针位于其边界外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 只有在拖放操作通常捕获鼠标。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations. 此事件使用冒泡路由，因为丢失捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据来确定实际失去捕获的元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost capture. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: 当输入设备在操作期间更改位置时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the input device changes position during a manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生多次，当用户拖动手指在屏幕上在操作过程和再次发生惯性。The event occurs multiple times when the user drags fingers over the screen during a manipulation and again when inertia occurs. 可以使用要检查是否在惯性期间发生的事件属性。You can use the property to check whether the event is occurring during inertia. 在具有的元素发生事件在事件发生时不受任何影响。The element on with event occurs is not affected in any way when the event occurs. 必须提供要操作的元素的逻辑。You must provide the logic to the element that is to be manipulated. 并属性，类型，包含有关该操作的位置更改的数据和解释为移动、 调整大小或旋转对象。The and properties, which are of type , contain data about how the position of the manipulations change and interpreted as moving, resizing, or rotating an object. 将该信息应用到要操作的元素。You apply that information to the element that is to be manipulated. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例使用属性来移动、 调整大小和旋转。The example uses the property to move, resize, and rotate a . 该示例还会检查是否延时和矩形是否接触窗口边缘的过程中发生事件。The example also checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果这种情况下均为 true，该应用程序将停止操作后，若要防止将应用程序的可见区域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ManipulationInertiaStarting As EventHandler(Of ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs)

summary.span: 当输入设备在操作期间与 对象失去联系且延时开始时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the input device loses contact with the object during a manipulation and inertia begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时在用户抬起手指从屏幕的所有在操作过程。The event occurs when the user lifts all of the fingers from the screen during a manipulation. 例如，如果用户"抛出"表面，用户将触摸要开始操作，请在一段短距离，屏幕上移动手指，然后释放。For example, if a user "throws" a across a surface, the user will touch the to begin the action, move the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then release the . 当用户释放该元素时，惯性开始和事件发生。When the user releases the element, inertia begins and the event occurs. 继续接收事件指出在元素上发生了延时。The continues to receive events to indicate that inertia is occurring on the element. 此事件可用于指定延时的行为。You can use this event to specify the behavior of the inertia. 例如，可以设置惯性开始时使用的初始速度。For example, you can set the initial velocity that is used when inertia begins. 通过设置预期的减速度或通过设置所需的位置，还可以指定延时的量。You can also specify the amount of inertia by setting the desired deceleration or by setting the desired placement. 可以单独设置这些值对于每种类型的操作 （转换、 扩展或旋转）。You can set these values for each type of manipulation (translation, expansion, or rotation) independently. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件处理程序，并设置预期的减速度转换、 扩展和旋转惯性期间使用。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). summary.span: 在首次创建操作处理器时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the manipulation processor is first created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有的元素上发生事件属性设置为`true`时用户将手指放在其上。The event occurs on an element that has the property set to `true` when the user puts a finger on it. 默认情况下，后续操作事件会报告的位置相对于元素具有操作设置为`true`。By default, subsequent manipulation events report the position of the manipulation relative to the element that has set to `true`. 您可以指定位置应为相对于另一个元素通过设置属性。You can specify that the position should be relative to another element by setting the property. 例如，可以相对于父元素的操作。For example, you can make the manipulation relative to the parent of the element. 此外可以执行的事件处理程序中的以下:You can also do the following in an event handler for : - 指定用户是否需要多个手指执行操作，通过设置属性。Specify whether the user needs more than one finger to perform the manipulations by setting the property. - 指定哪些类型的操作启用通过设置属性设置为枚举。Specify which types of manipulation are enabled by setting the property to a enumeration. - 通过设置指定的单指旋转中心属性。Specify the center of a single-finger rotation by setting the property. - 通过调用来取消该操作方法。Cancel the manipulation by calling the method. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件和集到接收操作事件，这样的操作坐标是相对于父元素的父元素。The following example shows the event handler for the event and sets the to the parent element that receives the manipulation events so that the coordinates of the manipulation are relative to the parent element. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中[演练：创建第一个触控应用程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). summary.span: 更新 的 。

summary.span: 父元素从其自身的 实现调用此方法以形成递归布局更新。

span.span: Parent elements call this method from their own implementations to form a recursive layout update.

summary.span: 调用此方法构成布局更新的第一个处理过程（“测量”处理过程）。

span.span: Calling this method constitutes the first pass (the "Measure" pass) of a layout update.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的布局位置计算[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]组成调用和调用。Computation of layout positioning in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] is comprised of a call and an call. 期间调用中，元素确定其大小要求使用`availableSize`输入。During the call, an element determines its size requirements by using an `availableSize` input. 期间完成调用时，元素大小。During the call, the element size is finalized. `availableSize` 可以是从零到无穷大的任意数字。`availableSize` can be any number from zero to infinite. 参与布局的元素应返回最小值它们需要的给定`availableSize`。Elements participating in layout should return the minimum they require for a given `availableSize`. 当首次实例化一个布局时，它始终会接收之前调用。When a layout is first instantiated, it always receives a call before . 但是之后第一个布局处理过程，, 它可能会收到而无需调用; 这可以仅影响的属性时更改 （如对齐方式），或者接收到父而无需.However, after the first layout pass, it may receive an call without a ; this can happen when a property that affects only is changed (such as alignment), or when the parent receives an without a . 一个调用将自动使失效调用。A call will automatically invalidate an call. 布局更新异步发生，以便在主线程不会等待每个可能的布局更改。Layout updates happen asynchronously, such that the main thread is not waiting for every possible layout change. 查询通过隐藏代码检查属性值的元素可能不会立即反映对大小调整或布局特征与之交互的属性的更改 (属性，例如)。Querying an element via code-behind checking of property values may not immediately reflect changes to properties that interact with the sizing or layout characteristics (the property, for example). > [!NOTE] > 可以通过强制布局更新方法。Layout updates can be forced by using the method. 但是，调用此方法通常不需要可能会导致性能不佳。However, calling this method is usually unnecessary and can cause poor performance. 布局系统保留的无效布局，一个用于两个单独的队列，另一个用于。The layout system keeps two separate queues of invalid layouts, one for and one for . 根据执行布局; 的元素的可视化树中元素的顺序排序布局队列在树中较高级别的元素位于队列，以避免在父级中的重复更改所造成的冗余布局的顶部。The layout queue is sorted based upon the order of elements in the visual tree of the element performing layout; elements higher in the tree are at the top of the queue, to avoid redundant layouts caused by repeated changes in parents. 自动从队列中删除重复项，如果他们已验证布局自动从队列删除元素。Duplicate entries are automatically removed from the queue, and elements are automatically removed from the queue if they are already layout-validated. 更新布局时，队列为空首先后, 跟队列。When updating layout, the queue is emptied first, followed by the queue. 中的元素队列中的元素是否将永远不会进行排列队列。An element in the queue will never be arranged if there is an element in the queue.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, provides measurement logic for sizing this element properly, with consideration of the size of any child element content.

returns.span: 此元素在布局中的所需大小。

span.span: The desired size of this element in layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是更常见的派生元素而非。It is more common to derive an element from rather than . 如果派生自，请注意，重写上印章并方法。If you are deriving from , note that an override of on seals the method. 因此，您只能重写作为一种方式来更改布局测量特征，如果从派生通过不包括继承。Therefore, you only override as a means to alter layout measure characteristics if you derive from through an inheritance that does not include . 如果您尝试构建您自己的实现，这可能是这种情况[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心级别。This might be the case if you are attempting to build your own implementation on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core-level. 否则为如果派生自，则度量值的行为的实现模板的实现。。Otherwise, if you are deriving from , then the implementation template for Measure behavior is the implementation of .. 具有子元素的父元素必须调用在每个的子活动，否则为这些子元素不调整大小或排列和有效地将从布局中消失。A parent element with child elements must call on each child, otherwise these child elements are not sized or arranged and will effectively disappear from layout. ## Examples 典型重写遵循这种近似模式 (不是一个名为的内置集合`VisualChildren`;`VisualChildren`是一个占位符，表示将元素维护任何子集合)。A typical override of follows this approximate pattern (there is not a built-in collection called `VisualChildren`; `VisualChildren` is a placeholder that represents whatever child collection your element maintains). [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementmeasureoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementmeasureoverride)] - 必须调用每个子元素上。You must call on each child element. - 通常情况下，您的实现应缓存之间的度量信息和方法调用的同一元素中。Generally, your implementation should cache measurement information between the and method calls in the same element. - 调用的基实现不是必需的但可能适用如果基实现提供所需的布局功能。Calling base implementations of is not required, but might be appropriate if the base implementation provides a desired layout capability. - 调用在子元素应通过属于相同`availableSize`作为父项或在区域的子集，具体取决于布局的类型的父元素支持。Calls to on child elements should pass either the same `availableSize` as the parent, or a subset of the area, depending on the type of layout the parent element supports. 例如，它将有效以删除特定于元素的边框或填充、 滚动条，或自定义控件的区域。For example, it would be valid to remove the area for an element-specific border or padding, a scrollbar, or a custom control.

para.span: 实现必须能够处理提供的值的是无限期。

span.span: Implementations must be able to process a value provided for that is infinite.

para.span: 无限值指示没有请求的约束，并有效地将推迟到父元素，通过递归调用度量值的度量值选择。

span.span: An infinite value indicates no requested constraints, and effectively defers measurement choice to the parent element, through recursive Measure calls.

para.span: 实现可以考虑为提供的值是软约束。

span.span: Implementations can consider the value provided for to be a soft constraint.

para.span: 子元素可能指定更大大小，即使应用程序代码的其他方面能够确定父元素的当前实际大小。

span.span: The child element might specify a larger size, even if other aspects of application code were able to determine the current actual size of the parent element.

para.span: 大型大小请求是一个约定，指示子元素查询父元素是否可以支持内容的显示区域内的内容滚动。

span.span: The large size request is a convention that indicates that the child element is querying whether your parent element can support content scrolling within a content display region.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在指针位于此元素上并且按下任意鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 任意一个协同通常引发事件或，对应于一个两个标准鼠标按钮按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 并也是路由的事件，但它们是直接路由的事件，并引发相应的特定于按钮的事件时事件到达事件路由中的此元素。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 请参阅备注或。See Remarks for or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控件可能具有固有的鼠标按钮事件处理的类。Some controls might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 鼠标左键按下事件是最有可能的事件，以便使类处理在控件中。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 类通常处理标记基础为已处理的类事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦该事件标记为已处理，其他实例处理程序附加到该元素通常不会引发。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 通常也不会引发的任何其他类或实例处理程序附加到针对 UI 树的根节点的浮升方向中的元素。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解决的问题，在前面的重要说明中所述和仍接收鼠标左键按下具有类处理通过使用这些解决方案的派生类上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加处理程序未标记为已由控件处理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 请注意，由于这是预览事件，该路由从根开始，隧道下行控件。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 虽然通过调用注册该控件上的处理程序，然后选择使处理程序以侦听事件，即使它们已标记为已处理路由的事件数据中的签名选项。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseEnter As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针进入此元素的边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，它使用直接事件处理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不会引发在路由过程;相反，它们被处理的同一元素中引发位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是，它们启用了路由的事件的行为，如在样式中的事件触发的其他方面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管跟踪当鼠标指针进入元素，此事件的多个边界确切地报告属性值已从`false`到`true`此元素上。Although tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 一个(或任何派生的类) 具有用于本机处理事件时该按钮具有焦点，并按下的键是空格键。A (or any derived class) has native handling for a event when the button has focus, and the pressed key is the space bar. 本机处理引发事件使用按钮作为源，同时还捕获鼠标，尽管鼠标指针不会显示移动。The native handling raises the event with the button as the source, and also captures the mouse, even though the mouse pointer does not appear to move. 由于鼠标捕获，而与作为源的按钮也会引发事件。As a result of the mouse capture, a event is also raised with the button as the source. 通常，如果在元素捕获鼠标，然后引发时，以及和可能是其他特定于控件的事件。In general, if an element captures the mouse, then is raised, as well as and possibly other control-specific events. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly MouseEnterEvent As RoutedEvent
