summary.span: 当请求显示光标时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: 每次鼠标指针移至新位置时都会在一个元素上引发此事件，这意味着光标对象可能需要根据其新位置进行更改。

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 此事件的名称引用游标不一定是文本光标 （有时称为插入点）。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反，此上下文中的光标是声明与多个可能的输入相关的设备或 Windows 编程中的概念相关的屏幕图形显示的对象。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in Windows programming. 该对象表示由在 WPF 中的类。That object is represented by the class in WPF. WPF 输入的系统，可更改此光标时它表示鼠标指针的屏幕上的位置。The WPF input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 可以使用预定义的值从枚举，也可以声明自定义光标为图像文件。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 侦听事件不是游标管理的有效技术。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反，每个元素应定义自己使用的游标行为和。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 您应仅依赖于如果不使用 WPF 框架级别的基本元素，或中的特殊情况下，在每个元素的基础上定义游标的行为不符合你的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 有关详细信息在响应中实现的游标行为，请参阅。For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应的隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `e`参数的类型为路由的事件的所有数据的公共基类型; 但是，应作为最具体的事件数据类型，是适用于要引发的事件，因为给定的事件数据派生的类包含适用于特定事件时将引发此事件的实际的特定数据属性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 不只是事件; 的状态属性它还标识要引发的路由的事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引发模式和路由的事件数据均不同于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和数据类，通常只包含与事件相关的属性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建事件数据，将事件标识符追加到数据，然后使用事件数据实例来引发自定义的路由的事件。The following example creates event data, appends the event identifier to the data, and then uses the event data instance to raise a custom routed event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此的最常见情形[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]是实现时[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]自定义的路由事件，特别是，当您实现在处理程序的"删除"逻辑与相关联的"包装器"事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]级别。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 以下示例中此部分说明了这种情况下的备注。The example that follows this remarks section illustrates this scenario. 如果存在任何与条件相匹配的输入的参数的方法调用注册的处理程序调用此方法起不起作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that matches the input parameters for the method call. 如果多个处理程序附加事件移除处理程序存储区中匹配的条件，仅第一个处理程序。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 此行为是与一致[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]的行为`-=`运算符。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既不`routedEvent`也不`handler`可能`null`。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 在尝试提供上述任意值作为`null`将引发异常。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 此方法将忽略`handledEventsToo`与第一个处理程序时提供的参数信息添加签名，它使已处理事件的处理。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 删除任一类型的处理程序。Either type of handler is removed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用作为事件包装器定义的一部分。The following example uses as part of an event wrapper definition. [!code-csharp[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#addremovehandler)] [!code-vb[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/VB/SDKSampleLibrary/Class1.vb#addremovehandler)]

summary.span: 获取（或设置）此元素的最终呈现大小。

span.span: Gets (or sets) the final render size of this element.

value.span: 此元素的呈现大小。

span.span: The rendered size for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要尝试设置此属性，在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]或在代码中，如果使用的 WPF 框架级别的布局系统。Do not attempt to set this property, either in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or in code, if using the WPF framework-level layout system. 几乎所有典型的应用程序方案将使用此布局系统。Nearly all typical application scenarios will use this layout system. 布局系统都不会遵循在中设置的大小直接属性。The layout system will not respect sizes set in the property directly. 属性声明为可写只是为了支持某些 WPF 核心级桥接有意避开典型布局协议，例如支持的情况下类。The property is declared writable only to enable certain WPF core-level bridging cases that deliberately circumvent the typical layout protocols, such as support for the class. 此属性可用于检查布局系统中的适用呈现大小如替代或。This property can be used for checking the applicable render size within layout system overrides such as or . 处理更通用的方案事件和类处理程序重写或事件。A more common scenario is handling the event with the class handler override or the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用自定义装饰器值，以便创建并设置其大小的矩形图形定义装饰器，作为的一部分，其实现。The following example shows how a custom adorner uses the value in order to create and size the rectangle graphic that defines the adorner, as part of its implementation. [!code-csharp[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#uielementdesiredsize)] [!code-vb[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#uielementdesiredsize)]

summary.span: 获取或设置影响此元素的呈现位置的转换信息。

span.span: Gets or sets transform information that affects the rendering position of this element.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现转换不会重新生成布局大小或呈现大小信息。A render transform does not regenerate layout size or render size information. 呈现转换通常用于进行动画处理，或者向元素应用临时效果。Render transforms are typically intended for animating or applying a temporary effect to an element. 例如，元素可以在缩放时已设定焦点或鼠标悬停，或可能会在加载要绘制到的该部分的眼睛抖动[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。For example, the element might zoom when focused or moused over, or might jitter on load to draw the eye to that part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: The default value is a with coordinates (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已使用某种程度上使用了非标准的结构中的值不表示的坐标系统中的绝对位置。 has a somewhat nonstandard use of the structure value, in that the does not represent an absolute location in a coordinate system. 相反，介于 0 和 1 之间的值被解释为范围中每对 x，y 轴的当前元素的一个因素。Instead, values between 0 and 1 are interpreted as a factor for the range of the current element in each x,y axis. 例如，(0.5，0.5) 将导致呈现转换要在元素上居中或 (1，1) 会将呈现转换在底部右下角的元素。For example, (0.5,0.5) will cause the render transform to be centered on the element, or (1,1) would place the render transform at the bottom right corner of the element. 不是一个可接受的值。 is not an accepted value. 0 和 1 以外的值也接受，并将导致更多的不寻常的转换效果。Values beyond 0 and 1 are also accepted, and will result in more unconventional transform effects. 例如，如果您设置(5，5)，并将，旋转点将是元素本身边界之外。For instance, if you set to be (5,5), and then apply a , the rotation point will be well outside the bounds of the element itself. 转换将旋转您围绕远在右下方的大圆的元素。The transform will spin your element around in a big circle that originates beyond bottom right. 原点某个位置可能在其父元素内，并可能位于可能是框架或视图之外。The origin might be somewhere inside its parent element and could possibly be possibly out of frame or view. 负的点值类似，这将超出左上边界。Negative point values are similar, these will go beyond the top left bounds. 呈现转换不会影响布局，并通常用于执行动画或向元素应用临时效果。Render transforms do not affect layout, and are typically used to animate or apply a temporary effect to an element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *xOrigin**xOrigin* 水平起点的系数。The horizontal origin factor. 这通常指定为介于 0 和 1 之间的值。This is typically given as a value between 0 and 1. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. *yOrigin**yOrigin* 垂直起点的系数。The vertical origin factor. 这通常指定为介于 0 和 1 之间的值。This is typically given as a value between 0 and 1. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. ## [!code-csharp[transformanimations_snip#UIElementRenderTransformOrigin](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/transformanimations_snip/CSharp/RotateAboutCenterExample.cs#uielementrendertransformorigin)] [!code-vb[transformanimations_snip#UIElementRenderTransformOrigin](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/transformanimations_snip/visualbasic/rotateaboutcenterexample.vb#uielementrendertransformorigin)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将返回`true`如果本地设置。This will return `true` if is locally set. 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果你要开发一个设计器或开发您自己控件包含通常调用此方法。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer or developing your own control incorporating a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 ShouldSerialize 和重置方法定义默认值](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md)。For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在呈现过程中，此元素的呈现是否应使用特定于设备的像素设置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether rendering for this element should use device-specific pixel settings during rendering.

summary.span: 这是依赖项属性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 如果元素应按照设备像素呈现，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element should render in accordance to device pixels; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 上声明的默认值为 。

span.span: The default as declared on is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置为`true`上您的根元素以启用像素对齐渲染整个 UI。You can set this property to `true` on your root element to enable pixel snap rendering throughout the UI. 对于运行在大于 96 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)]，像素对齐渲染可以尽量减少在单实线附近出现的抗锯齿视觉效果。For devices operating at greater than 96 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)], pixel snap rendering can minimize anti-aliasing visual artifacts in the vicinity of single-unit solid lines. 当由继承或任何可能派生类中，重写要设置此依赖项属性的元数据元数据属性设置为`true`。When inherited by or any possible derived classes, overrides the metadata for this dependency property to set the metadata property to `true`. 这实现了，只有最外层元素子树中的需要指定作为`true`，然后将报告所有子元素的子树作为`true`并且将具有视觉效果。What this achieves is that only the outermost element in a subtree needs to specify as `true`, and all child elements of that subtree will then report as `true` and will have the visual effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，它使用直接事件处理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不会引发在路由过程;相反，它们被处理的同一元素中引发位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是，它们启用了路由的事件的行为，如在样式中的事件触发的其他方面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管跟踪当触笔进入的边界的元素，此事件能够更确切地报告属性值已从`false`到`true`此元素上。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入中的特定关系存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，它使用直接事件处理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不会引发在路由过程;相反，它们被处理的同一元素中引发位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是，它们启用了路由的事件的行为，如在样式中的事件触发的其他方面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管跟踪当触笔离开元素，此事件的边界的详细信息按原义报告属性值已从`true`到`false`此元素上。Although tracks when the stylus leaves the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入中的特定关系存在。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextInput As TextCompositionEventHandler

summary.span: 在此元素以设备无关模式获取文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件可能已被标记处理由复合控件的内部实现。This event might already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 请参阅下面的备注。See Remark below. 事件可能已被处理的复合控件的内部实现标记。The event may already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 例如，是一个复合控件，其中事件已标记为已处理; 其组成中。For example, a is a composited control where the event is already marked as handled; within its compositing. 这么做是因为该控件需要解释某些类型的输入，如箭头键，为具有对该控件的特殊含义。Controls do this because the control needs to interpret some types of input, such as arrow keys, as having special meaning to that control. 如果使用作为附加文本输入的处理程序的位置的事件，可能会收到更好的结果。If you use as the event where you attach handlers for text input, you may receive better results. 该技术可以应对大多数情况下，其中控件组合已经此事件标记为已处理并且会阻止您的处理程序接收事件路由事件。This technique circumvents most cases where control composition has already marked this event as handled and prevents your handler from receiving the event along the event route. 事件允许组件或应用程序以与设备无关的方式侦听文本输入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 键盘是主要的方式，但语音、 手写和其他输入的设备也可以引发。The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 由于键组合的默认键盘或输入的法编辑器的多个关键事件可能会引发只是一个文本输入的事件。Because of key combinations - either in default keyboards or through input method editors - multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便属于类的成员列出时作为基元素继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下和手指触摸屏幕，并将移动之前不会发生的事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在屏幕上按住它而无需移动它会导致按下并保存的行为。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按下并保持行为等同于鼠标右键单击。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要使并事件发生只要上方的手指触摸屏幕上，设置附加到属性`false`此元素。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| - 相应的隧道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现类处理此事件在派生类中。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

The element to translate the given point into.

summary.span: 将相对于此元素的点转换为相对于指定元素的坐标。

span.span: Translates a point relative to this element to coordinates that are relative to the specified element.

returns.span: 相对于目标元素而不是此源元素的点值。

span.span: A point value, now relative to the target element rather than this source element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递`null`为`relativeTo`允许的并指示坐标应相对于此元素所属的逻辑树中根元素。Passing `null` for `relativeTo` is permitted, and indicates that coordinates should be relative to the root element in the logical tree that this element belongs to. 此方法用于转换命中测试点值。This method is used for translating hit test point values. 如果您创作的控件，并且需要处理较低级别的输入，则调用此方法是主要相关。Calling this method is mainly relevant if you are authoring a control and need to process input at a lower level. 如果使用现有的控件，一般可以假定已完成的控件将报告正确翻译后的命中的测试结果。If you are using existing controls, you can generally assume that completed controls will report correctly translated hit test results.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 请确保此元素的所有可视子元素都正确地进行了布局更新。

span.span: Ensures that all visual child elements of this element are properly updated for layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此方法具有的元素`false`或`false`将调用特定于元素和方法，这会强制布局更新，并将验证所有的计算的大小。When you call this method, elements with `false` or `false` will call element-specific and methods, which forces layout update, and all computed sizes will be validated. 调用此方法不起如果布局保持不变，或布局的排列方式既不度量状态无效。Calling this method has no effect if layout is unchanged, or if neither arrangement nor measurement state of a layout is invalid. 但是，如果布局中任一方面无效调用会将整个布局重做。However, if layout is invalid in either respect, the call will redo the entire layout. 因此，应避免调用元素树中每个增量和次要更改后。Therefore, you should avoid calling after each incremental and minor change in the element tree. 布局系统将执行元素布局，以延迟方式，使用一种算法，可平衡性能与货币和延迟到根更改，直到所有子元素都是有效的权重策略。The layout system will perform element layout in a deferred manner, using an algorithm that balances performance and currency, and with a weighting strategy to defer changes to roots until all child elements are valid. 应只调用如果您绝对需要更新的大小和位置，并且您仅可以确信您控制的和可能会影响布局的属性的所有更改都已都完成。You should only call if you absolutely need updated sizes and positions, and only after you are certain that all changes to properties that you control and that may affect layout are completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将影响，这又可能会引发事件。Setting this property affects the value of , which in turn may raise the event. 但是，有其他影响的因素，例如包含它的父项的可见性设置。However, has other factors that influence it, for instance the visibility settings of parents that contain it. 元素的不是不参与输入事件 （或命令）、 不会影响布局的测量或排列处理过程，不是按选项卡顺序和命中测试中将不会报告。Elements where is not do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the Measure or Arrange passes of layout, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 当由继承或其派生的类，重新定义为此属性的默认值。When inherited by or its derived classes, redefines the default value of this property to be . 此操作将不运行在最初创建布局的测量处理过程的，和返回 (0，0)。This has the effect of not running the Measure pass of layout on an initially created , and returns (0,0). 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . 此外会重新定义此默认值为，使用相似的结果行为及其派生类。 also redefines the default value to be , with similar resulting behavior for and its derived classes. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例实现引用都应是用户界面中的互斥对的两个不同的命名的按钮的处理程序。The following example implements a handler that references two different named buttons that are intended to be a mutually exclusive pair in the user interface. 在运行之前与该按钮关联的实际的程序逻辑，按钮本身设置为，并对中的其他按钮将设置为。Prior to running the actual program logic associated with the button, the button itself is set to be , and the other button in the pair is set to .
